title: Case 1
description: Circular of the All-Ukrainian Central Committee for Assistance to Victims of Pogroms on the Organization of the Legal Department, October 12, 1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 2
description: Instructions of the All-Ukrainian Central Committee for Assistance to Victims of Pogroms on organizing committees in districts, filling out accounting and control cards; justification documents for the funds spent, 15.08.1919-24.10.1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 3
description: Minutes of the meeting of the Shepetiv Jewish Public Council on arrests and robberies of passengers; mandate of the Commissioner of the Shepetiv Jewish Community Council, 03.10.1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 4
description: Report notes and reports of the head of the sanitary department of the Kamianets Jewish community and eyewitnesses about the pogroms in Kitayhorod, 06/27/1919-10/18/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 5
description: Copy of the report of the representative of the Yampil Jewish community on pogroms, 09/22/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 6
description: Copy of the report of the Zhmeryn Jewish Public Council on the state of the Jewish population after the pogroms that took place in July-August 1919, 09/29/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 7
description: Excerpt from the report and a letter from the Haysyn Branch of the All-Ukrainian Central Committee for Assistance to Victims of Pogroms on the Organization of the Legal Department, 02.10.1919-14.10.1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 8
description: Copy of the report of the inspector-instructor of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs of the Ukrainian People's Republic on bringing to justice those who took part in the pogroms, the list of victims, November 4, 1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 9
description: Correspondence with the Ministry of Jewish Affairs of the Ukrainian People's Republic, the Kamianets-Podilskyi Jewish Community on the allocation of funds for the provision of assistance to victims of pogroms, eyewitness accounts of looting, 08/21/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 10
description: Financial reports and supporting documents of the Zynkiv Jewish community, September 16, 1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 11
description: Act on the robbery of the cooperative of the Braille Society of the Union of Jewish Ex-Soldiers, 09/10/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 12
description: Applications for assistance from pogrom victims, lists of missing items, 08/22/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 13
description: Petition of a merchant from Vendy residents of the Podilsk province about the return of the manufactory taken from him, 09/22/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 14
description: Statements of the victims and testimony of the members of the Kamianets-Podilskyi Committee for Aid to Victims of Pogroms about the circumstances of the killing of Jews, 09/05/1919-10/07/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 15
description: Application of a pogrom-affected resident of Kitaygorod, Podilsk province, to provide him with material assistance, 09/28/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 16
description: Statements of victims of pogroms residents of the village. Minsk residents of the Podilsk province on providing them with material assistance, 02.09.1919-22.09.1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 17
description: Statement of the manufacturer of Mogilev-Podilskyi about the requisition of his monpansier, 09/01/1919-09/02/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 18
description: Statement of the Jewish community of Mogilev-Podilskyi and individuals about torture of the Jewish population and request for medical and food aid; certificate of the instructor of the All-Ukrainian Central Committee for Assistance to Victims of Pogroms, 09/07/1919-11/06/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 19
description: Statement of a resident of Murovani Kurylivtsi about the requisition of his eggs, 08/21/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 20
description: Statements of victims of pogroms from residents of the Podilsk province about losses, lists of stolen things, 06.26.1919-10.15.1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 21
description: Statement of a resident of the village. Zynkiv of the Podilsk province about the seizure of horses from it, 09/22/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 22
description: Statements of residents of Volyn cities on providing assistance to victims of pogroms; certificates of employees of the All-Ukrainian Central Committee for Assistance to Victims of Pogroms, September 22, 1919-December 8, 1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 23
description: Complaints of a resident of Solobkivtsi, who received damage to his hand during the pogroms and a doctor's certificate, 08/30/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 24
description: Statement of a resident of Sharivka of the Podilsk province about the theft of sugar, 16.09.1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 25
description: Statement of residents of the village Yaruga of the Podilsk province on the return of contributions to them, 09/28/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 26
description: Registration letters for persons affected by pogroms in the city of Bar, Podilsk province and in need of financial assistance, 08/24/1919-09/09/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 27
description: Registration letters for persons affected by pogroms in the village. Vovky residents of the Podilsk province and need financial assistance, 09/29/1919, 0 sheet.

title: Case 28
description: Registration letters for persons affected by pogroms in the town of Haysyn, Podilsk province and in need of financial assistance, 09/17/1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 29
description: Registration letters for persons affected by the pogroms in the town of Horodok, Podilsk province, and in need of financial assistance, September 10, 1919-September 12, 1919, 0 sheets.

title: Case 30
description: Registration letters for persons affected by the pogroms in the city of Kamianets-Podilskyi of the Podilsk province and in need of material assistance, 0 sheets.

description: Registration letters for persons affected by pogroms in Kuna, Podilsk province and in need of financial assistance, 10.1919, 0 sheets.
